data.title: Here Are the Movies Coming to Netflix in November (and the Ones That Are Leaving)
data.text:
November is just around the corner, and that means a whole new slew of movies are coming to a streaming television near you, if you have a Netflix account. Here’s a list of movies and television shows to look forward to in November, followed by the films you should watch fairly soon as they will no longer be available on Netflix once the month begins.

Movies and TV Shows Coming to Netflix

Artifact (2012)

Babes in Toyland (1961)

Bali: Season 1

Hell Is for Heroes (1962)

It’s Always Sunny in Philadelphia: Season 9
